metadata.title: Publishers can now determine exactly how much traffic is generated from Google’s News tab | What’s New in Publishing | Digital Publishing News
metadata.description: Google claims it sends people to news sites over 24 billion times a month, helping publishers build audiences and drive economic value. Now, thanks to a new feature introduced by the search giant, publishers can see for themselves precisely how much traffic Google’s News section really sends throug…
metadata.author: Monojoy Bhattacharjee
metadata.publisher: What’s New in Publishing | Digital Publishing News

sections: David Banks seems to be gearing up to do a media law newsletter. Worth subscribing now, just to encourage him…
This came in a year ago, but it's worth noting that it's there, it works, and it'll
show you that you get less traffic from Google News than you expect.
